# Polars {#sec-polars}

[Polars](https://www.pola.rs/) is a fast DataFrame library implemented in Rust and 
available for Python and R. It is designed to handle large datasets efficiently and 
provides a wide range of functionalities for data manipulation and analysis.

## Installation

```{r}
#| eval: false
Sys.setenv(NOT_CRAN = "true")
install.packages("polars", repos = "https://community.r-multiverse.org")
```
